nltk.model¶

class nltk.model.NgramModel(n, train, estimator=None)¶

A processing interface for assigning a probability to the next word.

choose_random_word(context)¶

Randomly select a word that is likely to appear in this context.

entropy(text)¶

Evaluate the total entropy of a text with respect to the model. This is the sum of the log probability of each word in the message.

generate(num_words, context=())¶

Generate random text based on the language model.

logprob(word, context)¶

Evaluate the (negative) log probability of this word in this context.

prob(word, context)¶

Evaluate the probability of this word in this context.
